edu.mines.jtk.sgl

Class MouseConstrained

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.MouseConstrained
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MouseOnLine, MouseOnPlane

    public abstract class MouseConstrained
extends java.lang.Object
    A constrained mouse. Classes that extend this abstract base class are used to convert mouse events, with mouse pixel coordinates, to points in a local coordinate system. The constraint is necessary, because mouse pixel coordinates are two-dimensional, whereas local coordinates are three-dimensional.
    Version:
    2005.07.05
    Author:
    Dave Hale, Colorado School of Mines

      • getMouseSegment

        protected Segment getMouseSegment(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
        Gets a line segment in local coordinates for the specified event. The endpoints A and B of the line segment lie on the near and far clipping planes, respectively.
        Parameters:
        event - the mouse event.
        Returns:
        the line segment.
